short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetch TruckersHub details based on Steam ID / TruckersMP ID of the current profile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**TruckersHub Profile Viewer**  
Get instant access to TruckersHub details with this Chrome extension!  

This extension seamlessly integrates with Steam and TruckersMP profiles, providing you with:  
- **Comprehensive TruckersHub Data**: View stats, achievements, and activity summaries.  
- **Steam Integration**: Fetch TruckersHub details directly from any Steam profile.  
- **TMP Compatibility**: Access TruckersMP profiles to see linked TruckersHub insights.  
- **Easy Navigation**: Quickly jump to TruckersHub profiles for more in-depth information.  

Stay connected to your virtual trucking journey with real-time updates and user-friendly features. Perfect for TruckersMP enthusiasts!  

---
